title.narrative: Central Asia Regional Economic Cooperation (CAREC) Corridor 2 (Mangystau Oblast Section) Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: The objective of the Investment Program is to increase transport connectivity and efficiency, and institutional effectiveness through the following activities: (a) road development (reconstruction of about 790 km of the road sections of the CAREC Corridor 2 in the Mangystau Oblast); (b) strengthening capacity for planning, project management and asset management; and (c) improving cross-border infrastructure and facilities. As part of the Investment Program, the Project aims to increase transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region. The Project will comprise the following components: (a) reconstruction of (i) an 86.7 km road section between the cities of Shetpe and Zhetybay and (ii) an 83 km road section between the cities of Zhetybay and Aktau; and (b) support for construction supervision.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Industry and Infrastructure Development formerly "Ministry of Investments and Developments"

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
c. By 2018: Reduced road-user costs to $0.43/vehicle-km from $0.64/vehicle-km in 2010 on Shetpe-Zhetybay-Aktau road sections.

description.narrative: Increased transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region

title.narrative: g. By 2021: Reduced travel time between Zhetybay and Zhanaozen to 1 hour from 1.5 hours in 2013

description.narrative: Increased transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region

title.narrative: f. By 2021: Increased traffic volume to 14,332 vpd from 11,780 vpd in 2013 on section between Zhetybay and Zhanaozen

description.narrative: Increased transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region

title.narrative: a. By 2018: Increased traffic volume to 1,700 vpd from 1,200 vpd in 2012 on section between Shetpe and Zhetybay

description.narrative: Increased transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region

title.narrative: b. By 2018: Increased traffic volume to 5,600 vpd from 1,200 vpd in 2012 on section between Aktau and Zhetybay

description.narrative: Increased transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region

title.narrative: e. By 2018: Reduced travel time between Aktau and Shetpe to 2 hours from 3.5 hours in 2012

description.narrative: Increased transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region

title.narrative: d. By 2018: Number of accidents per year on Shetoe-Zhetybay-Aktau sections reduced to 45 from 68 in 2009

description.narrative: Increased transport connectivity and efficiency in the Mangystau region
